message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this truly unique product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the market, but $900,000 undervalues the unique aspects of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  I believe this price point represents a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,350,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.
